title: Convenient synthesis and X-ray determination of 2-amino-6H-1,3,4-thiadiazin-3-ium bromides endowed with antiproliferative activity
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,17866-17876
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA02531H, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Hendawy N. Tawfeek, Alshaimaa Abdelmoez, Kholood A. Dahlous, Bahaa G. M. Youssif, Stefan Bräse, Kari Rissanen, Martin Nieger, Essmat M. El-Sheref
A series of new 1,3,4-thiadiazine bromide derivatives was developed as antiproliferative agents targeting EGFR, BRAFV600E, and VEGFR-2.
